author.name: Hemense Lan
author.bio:
Hey there! I'm Hemense, a passionate frontend developer with a knack for leadership and a love for creating intuitive web experiences. My expertise spans HTML, CSS, Typescript, and frameworks like React, Next, Express, Tailwind, TanStack, alongside a keen understanding of web performance optimization, accessibility, and SEO principles. 
 Outside of coding, you can find me exploring the latest tech trends, playing football, swimming, or enjoying a good anime. I'm always up for a new challenge and eager to make a positive impact wherever I go.
